description: When sharing a lab result with a web-based chart system patient, the clinician may choose to attach a Result Comment. Data for the Result Comment patient note is stored in this table.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record that is being released/unreleased.

columns.name: RELEASED_YN
columns.description:
Whether a result is released to a patient on MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: No
